meanings.sent1: The two wires were isoelectric, showing no difference in electric potential.
meanings.sent2: The battery terminals were isoelectric, ensuring a balanced flow of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The isoelectric wires decided to have a competition to see who could stay the most balanced.
meanings.sent4: The calm lake at sunset appeared isoelectric, with a serene and balanced beauty.
meanings.sent5: The isoelectric circuit maintained perfect harmony, like a peaceful symphony of electrons.

meanings.definition: A point at which a molecule has no net electric charge
meanings.sent1: The isoelectric of the molecule was crucial for its stability.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the isoelectric of the compound to understand its behavior.
meanings.sent3: The molecule felt relieved when it reached its isoelectric, finally feeling balanced.
meanings.sent4: In the world of atoms, the isoelectric was like finding perfect equilibrium.
meanings.sent5: The isoelectric of the substance was like a peaceful oasis in the chaotic world of charges.
